eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Bexar; Brewster; El Paso; Harris; Hidalgo; Tarrant; Travis; Val Verde; Webb, TX; AT 11:00 PM ON OCT 20, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:00 AM OCT 21, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM. IF THIS HAD BEEN AN ACTUAL EMERGENCY, YOU WOULD HAVE BEEN GIVEN ADDITIONAL INSTRUCTIONS. THIS IS A TEST. No action required.
